column3:
進行と報酬のリセットが完了しました
黄金石リセットにより以下の効果が発動しました
・初期装備品の性能アップ
<COL d7b450>・レアアイテムの追加</COL>
・探索結果の報告のクリア報酬アップ
column4:
Reset Rewards and Progress have been completed.
The following effects have been activated due to
the Golden Gemstone reset:
- Performance boost for initial equipment
<COL d7b450>- Addition of rare items</COL>
- Increase in clear rewards for reporting search
results

We will keep track of clues discovered while on
an expedition, inside of the bookshelf.
When all of the ancient books are returned to
this shelf, the path to the treasure hoard will
be opened.
